text: King Kull is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Fawcett Comics and currently by DC Comics. The character was created by Otto Binder and C. C. Beck, first appearing in Captain Marvel Adventures #125 (1951). == Fictional character biography == He is a prehistoric enemy of Captain Marvel and member of the Monster Society of Evil. He was the ruler and the last of the Beast-Men that once ruled the Earth until Cro-Magnon man rebelled, causing him to go into suspended animation. He has enormous strength and durability and a brilliant mind, along with bizarre technology. Category:Fawcett Comics Category:DC Comics supervillains
title: King Kull (DC Comics)
